code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminPage=()=>{const[prices,setPrices]=useState({Residential:{'1BHK':5000,'2BHK':8000},Office:{Small:10000,Large:20000},Goods:{Small:3000,Large:6000}});const[tax,setTax]=useState(18);const[billAmount,setBillAmount]=useState('');const calculateBill=()=>{const base=parseFloat(billAmount||0);const gst=base*(tax/100);alert("Total with GST: \u20B9".concat(base+gst));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Billing System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Enter Amount",onChange:e=>setBillAmount(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:tax,onChange:e=>setTax(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:calculateBill,children:"Calculate Bill"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Manage Prices"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(prices,null,2)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Manage Images"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Upload/Delete images for sliders here (future backend integration)."})]})]});};export default AdminPage;
